ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: RLST 755 covers the purity laws and traditions of the biblical and rabbinic periods. I enjoyed the class and would recommend it to another.
I would to a student that is eager to take a class that is very discussion based and can feel more involved in the learning process.
I would recommend it. The small class size allowed us to pursue our own interests in the form of a final paper.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: As purity law is a very important part of the Jewish ethos, this class was a great contribution to my understanding of the context of my field of study.
